text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Pres Donald Duck doesn’t mention that Americans are having issues collecting unemployment and stimulus checks. Freakin moron complains that no one is askin for help. If he would have taken Covid19 seriously in Feb, we wouldnt have lost so many Americans. Sayin its a scam by dems
